metadata.Title: CVE-2014-8126 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - high.
metadata.Description:
The scheduler in HTCondor before 8.2.6 allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary code. It was discovered that HTCondor ncorrectly invoked the mailx utility. An attacker could use this vulnerability to execute arbitrary commands.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-8126` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

htcondor - 8.6.8~dfsg.1-2
libclassad8 - 8.6.8~dfsg.1-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: condor package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '8.6.8~dfsg.1-2').
